title: 1BR in LES! Get it while it’s hot!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Queen size 1BR in LES! Get it while it’s hot!

No Short Term Rentals.
Broker Fee applies.

Don’t spend all of August scrambling to find the right apartment. It’s right here!

Just two flights up, this apartment is a quiet little oasis. The bedroom can easily accommodate a queen size bed, as well as a dresser. The living room is large enough to have an entertainment area in addition to a workstation, stools at the breakfast bar, and it gets decent natural light. The kitchen has white appliances and the bathroom features white subway tile walls and honeycomb tile floors.

Convenient to all the best dining, nightlife and shopping in the city, as well as two blocks from the Delancey/Essex stop- C/M/F/J/Z. Trader Joe’s, Target, and Essex Market being a mere 2-3 blocks away make grocery and household shopping a breeze.

This unit is tenant occupied. Contact Whitney today to set up an exclusive showing.

Broker Fee Applies

Tenants must make a combined 40x the rent and have credit over 700.
Guarantors must make 80x the rent and have credit over 700.
